entry.title: Apache virtual host statistics
entry.summary: As part of a project I’m working on I wanted to get a rough idea of the activity of the Apache virtual hosts on the system. I wasn’t able to find exactly what I wanted, so I refreshed my memory of curses to bring you vhoststats. This tools reads an Apache log file (with support for arbitrary formats) and generates a dynamic bar chart showing the activity (in number of requests and bytes transferred) of hosts on the system.
